Params: {3: "Having removed all the obstacles in your way, you have discovered Lamia's tracks on the way to the observatory."}
{3: 'Long and deep scratches graze the metal walls, marks that can only be made with her twinblade.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "She's indeed after the data of the zero-point reactor.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Except no one can answer you now.'}
